body:
Hi all,

I know I arrive a bit late to the party but I'd like to add a few comments.

I am a seasoned Python dev working mainly with Python in the financial / accounting  realm.
I am also using Go and in my search for a good python decimal.Decimal [1] equivalent in Go I found an interesting implementation [2]. The guys are using it in production to handle their online sales.

I am using it myself for some price related computations. I did not know about decnum [3] but will definitely look into it, thanks !

I would be interested to know what people interested in the decimal proposition think of shopspring/decimal

Cheers,
Florent

1: https://docs.python.org/3.5/library/decimal.html
2: https://github.com/shopspring/decimal
3: https://github.com/rin01/decnum
